statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureRole) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AzureRole)-[r:RESOURCE]->(m)-[s:RESOURCE]->(:AzureTenant) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
